Uses of Package
ie.gmit.dip

  • Classes in ie.gmit.dip used by ie.gmit.dip
    Class
    Description
    ConsoleColour
    Ascii codes to format console output.
    InputProcesser
    Handles input from the source.
    IOator
    Ensures that all implementing classes check that the source is validated and use a Scanner to get input from the source
    Patterns
    Declare's common patterns that may be matched in content
    ScriptParsator
    Role of ScriptParsator is to remove HTML and Script tags including metadata from a String plus the functionality it inherits from WordParsator.
    Sources
    The word cloud sources: File or URL
    WordParsator
    Role of WordParser - is to ensure text stored in a string is cleaned up of non word text\symbols and the text is split into an array of strings
